component.name: Minigalaxy
component.summary: A simple GOG client for Linux

description.p: Minigalaxy lets you download, install and play your GOG Linux games without getting in your way.
Besides all that, it offers the following additional features:

ul.li: Select in which language you'd prefer to download your games
Change where games are installed
Search your GOG Linux library
Show all games or just the ones you've installed
View the error message if a game fails to launch
Enable displaying the FPS in games

description.p: An account on gog.com is required to use this application.
